data.title: Austin Events in February & March 2024
data.meta_description: Discover the unique annual festivals and events in Austin during February and March. Find event details and start planning your trip today.
data.text:
Austin Events Calendar February & March 2025

For the latest updates about the status of each event, please check each event's website.

Check out this list for a selection of the largest annual events in Austin during February & March. For a more extensive list of daily happenings, see the searchable Events Calendar.

February 2025 Austin Events and Festivals

2/16/25

Austin Marathon

The Ascension Seaton Austin Marathon is returning to Austin in 2025. Whether you participate in the marathon, half marathon or 5K, or cheer on the runners, don't miss this exciting race through Downtown Austin.

youraustinmarathon.com

2/19/25 - 2/23/25

OUTsider Festival

The VORTEX

As one of Austin’s most progressive festivals, OUTsider brings together Austin’s LGBTQ community for three days of creation and inspiration. This multidisciplinary art festival showcases film, performance art, music, visual art and more.

outsiderfest.org

2/22/25 - 3/2/25

ATX Open

Westwood Country Club

The ATX Open is the only professional tour-level tennis tournament held annually in Austin. As part of the Hologic WTA Tour, the ATX Open is one of 50-plus events and four Grand Slams, spanning six continents, and nearly 30 countries and regions, reaching a global audience of over 700 million.

atxopen.com

Black History Month

Various Venues

To commemorate Black History Month there will be events throughout the city celebrating important people and moments in time in African-American history.

​Carnaval Brasileiro

Speakeasy

Carnaval in Austin is one of the biggest Brazilian Carnaval celebrations outside Brazil. Brasileiro-style samba, costumes and wild abandon can all be seen in the heart of Texas.

sambaparty.com

Jo's Chili Cook-Off

Jo's Coffee South Congress

Join Jo's for a day of live music, cold beer and chili as they host their 16th Annual Chili Cook-Off. Entry to the event is free, and guests can purchase a wristband day-of to taste chili from some of Austin's best restaurants and amateur culinary talent.

joscoffee.com

March 2025 Austin Events and Festivals

2/22/25 - 3/2/25

ATX Open

Westwood Country Club

The ATX Open is the only professional tour-level tennis tournament held annually in Austin. As part of the Hologic WTA Tour, the ATX Open is one of 50-plus events and four Grand Slams, spanning six continents, and nearly 30 countries and regions, reaching a global audience of over 700 million.

atxopen.com

3/7/25 - 3/15/25

SXSW® Music, Film and Interactive Conference and Festival

Austin Convention Center & Downtown Austin

Every spring, crowds descend on the downtown Austin to experience the world-renowned SXSW Conference & Festivals. Consisting of three main components, Interactive, Music and Film, each track brings top creatives and global professionals together to collaborate during this exciting 10-day event.

sxsw.com

3/14/25 - 3/29/25

Rodeo Austin

Travis County Expo Center

Over the years, Rodeo Austin has grown from a show featuring 16 animals into one of Austin's premier events, featuring Pro rodeo events, daily concerts, livestock show and more.

rodeoaustin.com

3/26/25 - 3/29/25

​​Clyde Littlefield Texas Relays

Mike A. Myers Stadium

The premier track & field event brings together the best high school, college and professional athletes from Texas, the U.S. and the world.

texassports.com

Austin Urban Cultural Fest

Auditorium Shores

More than 15,000 music revelers converge on Auditorium Shores at Lady Bird Lake to enjoy Austin's only music festival focused on R&B, neo-soul and hip hop music. The event will also showcase other cultural makers, such as dancers, chefs and creators.

urbanmusicfest.com

Local & Live Music Showcase

Austin Visitor Center

Drop by the Visitor Center for a free music showcase featuring daily programming packed with local artists. While you're there explore the shop and pick-up Austin-themed art, apparel, home goods, accessories and more.

visitaustin.org

NASCAR at COTA

Circuit of The Americas

Circuit of The Americas (COTA) will welcome race fans this March when NASCAR returns Austin for the second time, courtesy of Speedway Motorsports. Experience another unforgettable race weekend with the running of the NASCAR Cup Series, Xfinity Series and Camping World Truck Series at COTA.

nascaratcota.com

San Antonio Spurs I-35 Series

Moody Center

Basketball fans mark your calendar, the I-35 Series is back in Austin, Texas at the Moody Center. Watch the San Antonio Spurs take on some of the best teams in the league.

moodycenter.com
